title: chaaladha harinama
sahitya:
caaladaa hari naama sowkya mrutamu damaku

caaladaa hitavaina cavulella nosagaa

(caaladaa)



caraNam 1



idi yokaTi hari naamam intaina caaladaa

cedara kee janmamula ceralu viDipincaa

madinokaTEharinaama mantramidi caaladaa

padivELu narakakoopamula veDalincaa

(caaladaa)



caraNam 2



tagu vEnkaTEsu keertana mokaTi caaladaa

jagamulO kalpa bhoojambuvalE numDaa

sogisi yaa vibhuni daasula karuNa caaladaa

nagavu joopula nunnata mepuDu joopa

(caaladaa)
